title: Prime Residential block
details:
GALLE- 3 Km to Karapitiya Hospital, 10 minutes walk to leading schools, Richmond Boys ,Rippon Girls
5 minutes walk to Bus stops Gintota Rd-Galle (Gintota -Galle )or Wekunugoda Rd (Wekunugoda-Galle) .
2 minutes walk to Railway Stop .
12 meters road access, to 7.65 perches prime land, clear title, with electricity and water supply facilities ,.
Excellent Residential block ,flat land in a quiet residential area available for immediate sale.
Galle Municipal council approval and Soil test results ,clear title available.
Contact 0774164001.
